data.text: @smdoung Hola Shannon, we have replied to your DM. Regards
@ianpfarrar Hola, we will consult this case internally and contact you back as soon as we have details. Regards
@DrRyanKelly Hola Ryan, could you send us your PIR number by DM please? Regards.
@judehamilton0 Hola Jude, you can check in your cabin bag for free as long as it doesn't exceed the established hand baggage dimensions. Regards.
@PlutoSeason Hola, do you have an open case number? could you send us the details by DM? Regards.
@andre_cuesta Revisamos, gracias
@Nacho1970 Hola Nacho, si tu consulta es en español, escríbemos a @iberia, además facilítanos por DM detalles de lo ocurrido. Saludos
@findgus We remain at your disposal. Regards.

@hegarty_deirdre Are you sure that you cleaned all cookies and accept them all again? The voucher is working from our end and we tried on more than one PC. We aren't able to reproduce the error you mention
@Anita_HM0524 Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. We've just replied your DMs. Best regards

urls.title: IBERIA.COM en United States - the best prices for Iberia flights
urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

data.text: @hegarty_deirdre cookies from your memory cache, accept them all once again and then move on with the purchase at https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC . Kind regards

urls.title: IBERIA.COM en United States - the best prices for Iberia flights
urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

data.text: @hegarty_deirdre The voucher can only be used at our website https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC , it doesn't work for bookings over the phone. As shown on the screenshot we sent you last week, your voucher is working and can be used at our site. So please make sure to clear all /1
@findgus Hola Gus, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@findgus Hola Gus, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our sincerest apologies. Please contact our colleagues at the airport for further assistance. Best regards
@andre_cuesta Hola, lamentamos leer tu comentario. ¿Nos envías un mensaje privado con los detalles de tu caso por si podemos ayudarte por aquí? Saludos
@katefroehlich46 Hola Kate, we replied your DM. Regards.
@ciaranoreilly85 Thank you, we replied.

@MechiLopezPaz Hola Mechi, sentimos las molestias ocasionadas, para poder ayudarte necesitamos que si la consulta es en español debes dirigir a @Iberia, si es en inglés @Iberia_en, además del PIR, número de reclamación de equipajes y datos personales asociados al mismo. Saludos
@Mari_8185 Hola, ¿nos envías un mensaje privado con el código de reserva para ver el caso? Gracias. Un saludo
@Jamie_RB78 Hola Jamie, In order to help you, you need to send us a DM with your complaint information and contact details. Thank you.
@AndresFRial Hola Andrés. Estamos ahora contigo por DM, gracias.
@racheldpak Hola Rachel, we have replied your DM, please continue through that channel. Regards
@TanyaKh48700934 Hola Tanya, thank you, we have replied your DM. Regards
@rayalseematiger Hola, thank you for the information, we have replied your DM. Regards
@HarrisonCrosb10 Hola Harrison, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@Briianna_Monae Hola Bri, we are sorry to read this, could you tell us by DM if you opened a formal complaint at the airport? Thanks in advance  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@sarambas91 Hola Stefan, thank you for the information, if your bag was located, as soon as our colleagues have an update, they will contact you directly with the deliver details process, we really appreciate your patience. Kind regards
@CarlMarsalis Hola Rick, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us more details of your situation by DM in order to help you? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@rettascroggs2 Thank you Loretta, we've responded your DM. Regards
@GoldenMulat Hola. Sentimos mucho la incidencia con tu equipaje. Te hemos solicitado alguna información a través del MD que nos enviaste. Estaremos muy atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@nrdavid04 HEllo. We are surprised by what you tell us. We have requested the details of your case through the last comment you published. Kind regards.
@nrdavid04 Hello. Please let us know all the information about your case through a direct message. We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.
@lcjm0423 Hola Lorelei, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM requesting for your claim details. Regards

@meryyrem Hola María, did you open a claim at the airport? Do you have a PIR number? If so, please send us the number in a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) and your full name. We remain at your disposal, regards
@jonathanabujj Hola Jonathan, in this case you should contact your Iberia Plus centre so they can help you and indicate how to proceed. Kind regards
@michelle_pujals Michelle, we have replied your DM. Regards

@michelle_pujals Hola Michelle, we are going to help you from this channel. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) with your booking code and ticket number that starts with 075. We remain at your disposal, regards
@Jamie_RB78 Jamie, please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) with the claim number so we can verify.
@GazzadiMatteo Hola Matteo, did you try cleaning cache and the browsing history or using another browser or the app?
@rettascroggs2 Hola Loretta, please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) with the number of foundspot so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @Jamie_RB78 Hola Jamie, we are sorry to hear this. did you open a claim here https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG? If so, please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) with the number of it so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards
@racheldpak Rachel, we have asked our colleagues from the responsible department to send us updates about your luggage. As soon as we hear back from them we will contact you again. Kind regards

@MrFellowG Sam, you can find this information in your e-mail. You should have received two emails, one with the booking code and the other with the ticket number. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
@JoanBarata Joan, we are sorry we can not tell you something different from what we told you before. We remain at your disposal for future requests. Kind regards
@rahul172020 Rahul, 24 hours before your flight.
@rahul172020 Hola Rahul, when you are doing the check in https://t.co/0Kf2bPGDPV you must complete all the personal information, including your passport. Regards
@saul_zarrate Hello, we have sent you an answer again through our direct message conversation. Regards.
@flyingAndre Hola Andreas, we replied to your DM. Regards.

@steph__green Hola Steph, this one SNRM8N is valid, we remind you that all your flights are operated with LATAM and only the last one with us, so you should contact with them to find out about the check in for the first flight. Regards.
@JoanBarata When you book in our site the operator is specified, Best regards.
@saul_zarrate Hola Saul, we sent you a DM, we await your reply. Thank you.

@steph__green Hola Steph, sometimes depending of the flight you can check only at the counter or 24 hours before the flight. Could you send us your booking code to give you the LATAM locator? Thank you.
@JoanBarata Hola Joan, how we can help you?
@Lee682568901 Hola Lee, we replied to your DM. Regards.

@bellapupa85 Hola, we are sorry to read what happened. Please send us the details by DM. If you filed the claim at the airport and have a PIR code, please include it in your message so we can verify all the information. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@ScootmanMusic Hola Scott, we do not know the details of your query. Please send us a direct message with more information so that we can follow up on your case from here. We remain attentive to your message. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@steph__green Hola Steph, thank you for contacting us. Have you tried to delete all your cache and cookies from your browser? If you have made it and still can't check-in, you can do it at the counters of Iberia at the airport without an extra cost. Kind regards.
@dwayne_trip Hola, we have sent your answer to your querub direct message. We remain attentive in case you have any additional questions. Kind regards.
@racheldpak Hola Rachel, we replied to your DM. Thank you.

@elaineherbert26 Hola Elaine, could you send us the PIR code, your complete name and your full contact details by DM? Thank you.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@timikichi Hello. We have sent you a new direct message. As we indicated there, your case has been escalated and we are waiting for news from the area in charge. Kind regards.
@BuckeyeTap Hello. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Kind regards.
@MrAlford14 Hello. We have responded to your query through the md you sent us. Kind regards.
@ChilliBom Hello. We have responded to the last comment you posted. Kind regards.
@ChilliBom Hello. Thanks for writing to us. As we indicated in our previous messages, the area in charge is reviewing your case, as soon as we have any news we will inform you. Kind regards.

domain.name: News Vertical
domain.description: News Categories like Entertainment or Technology

data.text: @katefroehlich46 Hello. As soon as the area in charge has any news about your case, they will contact you. We appreciate your patience. Kind regards.
@smdoung Hello, Shannon. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Regards.

@sarveynotsorry Hello. We are very sorry for the incident with your luggage. If the flight was operated by LEVEl, you will need to file the claim directly with them. From here, we remain at your disposal. Kind regards.

urls.title: Objects banned on board the aircraft - Iberia
urls.description: Objects banned on board the plane are those that cannot be carried for reasons of safety. Enter to see regulations in this regard

data.text: @aheneves Hello. In principle, we do not anticipate any inconvenience if it is digital. You can check all the details at the following link: https://t.co/y5cS92sWWY Kind regards.

urls.title: Equipaje de mano o cabina - Iberia
urls.description: Lo que debes saber sobre el equipaje de mano que puedes llevar en cabina en los vuelos de Iberia: medidas, artículos permitidos, transporte de líquidos...

@ChilliBom Hola, we don´t have any update from our colleagues, as soon as we hear back from them we will contact you.

@ianpfarrar Ian, as we told you before please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB652lE) with your claim number so we can verify.

@chillwann Hello Will. We have answered your direct message. Also, what you shared to us is your irregularity part (PIR) code, not your case number file. We have informed you on how to proceed. 
Regards,

@rayalseematiger Hola, we understand that your last flight was operated by Iberia ¿correct? If so, please send us a DM (https://t.co/HyIAB652lE) with your full name, booking code, description of the luggage, content list and if you have the bag tag. We remain at your disposal, regards
@zaibb76 Hola, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DMs
@DrCorriel Hola Dana, we are checking your DM. We will continue the conversation there. Kind regards
@DrCorriel Hola Dana, could you send us the details of what you mentioned by DM? Thank you.

@leonardobaldi18 We're really sorry, Leonardo. Once the bags have been located, you'll receive a SMS or email with further details. For now, please keep the original invoices/receipts related to the first necessity expenses for being without luggage. Apologies
